@ fhollande "your initiative meets the values ​​of France" https://t.co/6tAmnhcU8M
@ fhollande "we have a legal commitment by our constitution and morals.It is also a duty of humanity"
@ fhollande "the people come to protect themselves on our continent, simply to live, to survive."
. @ fhollande "we had to gather all the forces of our country and look for new solutions"
"We have set up reception and orientation centers throughout the country" @fhollande
"It was necessary to mobilize associations, citizens, to convince elected officials" @fhollande
"Waiting for refugees to come to us is to put them at risk for their lives" @fhollande
"European naval forces have been able to save men, women, children at sea" @fhollande
"Resettlement is to go and get refugees in Lebanon, Jordan, Turkey." @fhollande
. @ fhollande "our services go to Lebanon to make contact with refugees meeting the conditions of the asylum application"
RT @jm_leguen: Proud to sign with @BrunoLeRoux a protocol of agreement for the reception of refugees coming from border camps of Syri ...
"We can not succeed alone, we also need the mobilization of our societies" @fhollande
"With this protocol, you will seek the most vulnerable to welcome them with a goal of 500 people" @fhollande
"Your associations take into account the transportation, accommodation and support in France of these populations" @fhollande
@ fhollande "your initiative confirms that in a secular republic, fruitful collaborations with churches are possible"
"You will not look at the religion of these people but their situation and urgency" @fhollande
@fhollande "indifference is our main adversary when there is a crisis situation."
"Worse than indifference, there is intolerance, consisting of not wanting to welcome and use the fears to prevent solidarity"
"Intolerance also consists of opposing one another, that of those who claim to speak in the name of the people" @fhollande
"To welcome the most fragile, to accompany the most isolated, it is the message of France and that which you addressed to the world" @fhollande
